title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Implements secure payment processing, real-time inventory management, and responsive design.
longDescription:
This e-commerce platform was developed to provide a complete online shopping experience.

Key Features:
• Secure user authentication and authorization
• Real-time inventory management system
• Integration with Stripe for payment processing
• Responsive design for all devices
• Admin dashboard for product management

Development Process:
1. Initial planning and architecture design
2. Frontend development using React and TailwindCSS
3. Backend API development with Node.js
4. Database design and implementation with MongoDB
5. Integration of payment gateway and security features
6. Testing and deployment

title: AI Image Recognition
description: Machine learning project using TensorFlow for real-time image recognition. Includes custom model training and web interface for live camera feed processing.
longDescription:
An advanced AI-powered image recognition system capable of identifying objects in real-time.

Key Features:
• Real-time object detection
• Custom model training interface
• Support for multiple camera inputs
• Performance optimization for edge devices

Technical Implementation:
1. Model architecture design and training
2. Integration with web cameras
3. Backend processing optimization
4. Frontend development for real-time display

title: Blockchain Voting System
description: Decentralized voting system built on Ethereum blockchain. Features secure voter authentication, vote verification, and real-time result tabulation.
longDescription:
A secure and transparent voting system leveraging blockchain technology.

Key Features:
• Secure voter authentication
• Immutable vote recording
• Real-time vote counting
• Transparent audit trail

Implementation Details:
1. Smart contract development
2. Frontend interface creation
3. Security implementation
4. Testing and deployment to testnet
